main event: On 12 March 1952, several air force personnel at Lockbourne AFB observed a bright light traveling at high speed from NW to SE.
interesting points: The object was described as a long, shiny, wingless object tapering to a point,The sighting lasted for 2 to 3 minutes,Observations were made through binoculars by air force personnel and a pilot with his instructor,The object was reported to have a vapor trail from a D-45 aircraft,Several names of observers were volunteered.
witness description: air force personnel and a pilot with his instructor
